lamparski.areabase

Class AreaActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • lamparski.areabase.AreaActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AreaDataService.AreaListCallbacks, AreaDataService.AreaLookupCallbacks, OnError

    public class AreaActivity
extends Activity
implements AreaDataService.AreaLookupCallbacks, AreaDataService.AreaListCallbacks
    The main screen of the application. It contains the fragment host for all of the components which use the area data provided by the ONS and so on. It contains the reference to the Area object, and links to display different data about this Area. At present, it only loads the current MSOA for where the user is standing and has limited support to load other areas based on the text search, but this could be alleviated... TODO: Create an issue on this; should be able to view other areas & navigate hierarchy. ...but not right now.
    Author:
    filip
    See Also:
    Area, IAreabaseFragment

      • startGraphActivity

        public void startGraphActivity(nde2.pull.types.DataSetFamily family,
                      nde2.pull.types.Area area)
        This gets called by chartlinks in SubjectViewFragment. It will launch a new Activity that shows a graph of the given dataset. Refer to GraphActivity for more information.
        Parameters:
        family - the dataset family to generate a graph for
        area - the area to generate a graph of family for
